reasoning: CDAN (also known as CANVAS) is an extremely rare multi-system genetic disorder. Fewer than 100 cases reported. Estimated incidence <0.01 per 100k.
source: Szmulewicz DJ et al. (2011). CANVAS-a distinct syndrome of cerebellar ataxia with neuropathy and vestibular areflexia. Lancet Neurol. 10(3):267-275
